10:52.race_name: Prix de Navarrenx (Hurdle) (Conditions) (3yo Fillies Unraced Over Obstacles) (Turf)

runners.breeder: E Chevalier Du Fau, A Chevalier Du Fau Et Al
runners.comment: Flat-bred daughter of Sageburg; third foal and the dam is yet to produce anything of note
runners.name: Mira Viva
runners.spotlight: Flat-bred daughter of Sageburg; third foal and the dam is yet to produce anything of note.

runners.comment: Down the field in two Flat races but bred to be better in this discipline
runners.name: Madona Des Mottes
runners.spotlight: Down the field in two Flat races (1m4f/1m7f) but she's a half-sister to three winners, including the smart jumpers Defi Des Mottes and Guenna Des Mottes; could do better in this discipline.

runners.comment: Dam unraced but sire Tunis was multiple-placed in Grade 1 hurdle races
runners.name: Tunisya
runners.spotlight: Dam unraced but sire Tunis was multiple-placed in Grade 1 hurdle races; headgear fitted from the outset.

runners.comment: Finished seventh in sole Flat run; bred to fare better in this discipline
runners.name: Matchuga
runners.spotlight: Finished seventh in sole Flat run (1m7f; ahead of Madona Des Mottes); dam unraced but the sire was high class over jumps, so she may be better suited to this discipline.

runners.breeder: J Juillet, G Juillet & Mme F Juillet
runners.comment: Half-sister to two modest maidens on the Flat but her dam was a winner over fences
runners.name: Dizavril Pelem
runners.owner: Joel Juillet, Gregoire Juillet & Christian Coatantiec
runners.spotlight: Half-sister to two modest maidens on the Flat but her dam was a winner over fences.

runners.comment: Sire was a smart middle-distance performer but her dam was of little account
runners.name: Bella Chironne
runners.owner: Matthieu Havart, Rene Perigois Et Al
runners.spotlight: Sire was a smart middle-distance performer but her dam was of little account; perhaps best watched.

runners.comment: Showed ability when runner-up over 1m4f at Lignieres in late November
runners.name: Sameness
runners.spotlight: Showed ability when runner-up over 1m4f at Lignieres in late November, looking at home on the very soft ground; likely contender.

runners.breeder: Mme I Mauger, P Noue & G Benachour
runners.comment: Sister to Meme Pas Kap who won over fences at Auteuil in May
runners.name: Nattendons Pas
runners.spotlight: Sister to Meme Pas Kap, who won over fences at Auteuil in May, and a half-sister to Flat/hurdle winner One More Light; could be interesting.

runners.breeder: Mme I Pacault, Mme A-S Pacault & Mme M Girot-Pacault
runners.comment: Only tenth in a Flat race over 1m7f at Craon during the summer; dam did win over fences
runners.name: Manastella
runners.spotlight: Only tenth in a Flat race over 1m7f at Craon during the summer; dam did win over fences.

11:28.race_name: Prix Mortimer de Lassence (Cross Country Conditions Chase) (5yo+) (Turf)

runners.comment: Won last two editions of this race and returned from layoff with recent course win
runners.name: Hip Hop Conti
runners.spotlight: Three-time winner of the same 4m1f Listed cross-country chase here and also won the last two editions of this race (both times on heavy ground); returned from nine-month break with 2m7f course win (heavy) a fortnight ago and ought to be very hard to beat.

runners.breeder: Mme Ac Andre, Haras De Saint-Voir Et Al
runners.comment: Ran well when third behind Hip Hop Conti here two weeks ago
runners.name: Ici Avrilly
runners.spotlight: Four-time cross-country winner (once here); gave good account before fading into third behind Hop Hop Conti here (2m7f, heavy) two weeks ago and will be fine over today's longer trip; likely collect another minor prize.

runners.comment: Game winner two starts ago but seemingly not the force of old
runners.name: Shawinigan
runners.spotlight: Battled gamely for narrow cross-country win at Haras du Pin (3m2f, good to soft) in October but was soundly beaten in Compiegne Listed race last month and is seemingly not the force of old.

runners.comment: Third in two cross-country chases last month; unraced beyond 3m
runners.name: Loralink
runners.spotlight: Third in two cross-country chases (2m5f/2m7f) since winning a regulation chase in July but veered left and unseated jockey on approach to mid-race fence on latest outing and has stamina to prove on first venture beyond 3m.

runners.comment: Back from long layoff with two underwhelming runs this autumn
runners.name: Gravity Blue
runners.spotlight: Rallied well in closing stages to win 2m5f cross-country chase here (heavy) in February 2024 but returned from long layoff with two lesser runs this autumn, finishing behind Loralink at Fontainebleau on latter occasion.

runners.comment: Behind two of these rivals when well-held fifth here (2m7f) a fortnight ago
runners.name: Iris Des Vignaux
runners.owner: Yvonnick Bothamy, Gabriel Leenders & Jean-Paul Bothamy
runners.spotlight: Dual cross-country winner at Craon (2m4f/3m1f) but behind Hip Hop Conti and Ici Avrilly when well-held fifth here (2m7f, heavy) a fortnight ago and appears to face another tough task.

12:05.race_name: Prix Alfred Torrance (Hurdle) (AQPS Conditions) (3yo Colts & Geldings) (Turf)

runners.comment: Ran quite well on second of two Flat start; makes hurdling debut today
runners.name: Mornac
runners.owner: Charles-Amedee De Clermont-Tonnerre, James Eason Et Al
runners.spotlight: Bettered low-key Flat debut when very respectable fifth of 16 at Les Sables d'Olonne (1m5f, good to soft) in October and has possibilities if he copes with the slower ground on this hurdling debut.

runners.comment: Creditable fourth in 1m4f Group 3 in July; makes hurdling debut today
runners.name: Magic Bede
runners.spotlight: Scoeed on Flat debut in June and made the frame on both subsequent Flat starts, more recently when fourth in 1m4f AQPS Group 3 in July; makes hurdle debut after five-month break and is untested on ground slower than good to soft but still looks interesting.

runners.comment: Improved form when keeping-on second on the Flat last month; hurdle debut today
runners.name: Manageur De Mee
runners.spotlight: Outran 34-1 odds when keeping-on second (no threat to winner) at Moulins (1m4f, very soft) last month, his second Flat start; no surprise if he features on this hurdling debut.

runners.breeder: P Lemaitre, Ecurie Bred To Win Sc & Mme E Lemaitre
runners.comment: Made fairly encouraging Flat debut before struggling in AQPS Group 3; hurdle debut today
runners.name: Mirvana
runners.owner: Ecurie Bred To Win Sc & Ecurie Des Dunes
runners.spotlight: Third of five on Flat debut at Vittel (1m4f, good to soft) in August before struggling to get competitive in heavy-ground AQPS Group 3; others look stronger.

runners.comment: Last of seven on last month's Flat debut (1m3f); not the most obvious answer
runners.name: Magnum Derable
runners.spotlight: Last of seven on last month's Flat debut (1m3f); hood added for this hurdling debut; not the most obvious answer.

runners.comment: Never really got competitive when sixth of seven on Flat debut at Nantes in October
runners.name: Marinello
runners.owner: Ecurie Madame Jacques Cypres & F Nicolle
runners.spotlight: Never really got competitive when sixth of seven on Flat debut at Nantes (1m4f, soft) in October.

runners.comment: Kept on well for second on Flat debut at Angers in November; high on the list
runners.name: Manuscrit
runners.spotlight: Kept on well for second behind Malte de Solzen on Flat debut at Angers (1m3f, heavy) in November and looks a good candidate for hurdling; high on the list.

runners.comment: Out of a mare placed over hurdles and fences; entitled to learn from this debut experience
runners.name: Mayereau
runners.spotlight: Out of a mare placed over hurdles and fences; entitled to learn from this debut experience.

runners.comment: Heavy-ground Flat winner last month; likely contender on Flat debut
runners.name: Malte De Solzen
runners.spotlight: Buit upon promising Flat debut when fending off Manuscrit to score at Angers (1m4f, heavy) last month; likely contender on hurdle debut.

runners.comment: 2-3 on the Flat, the latter win gained in heavy-ground AQPS Group 3; must be considered
runners.name: Match Amical
runners.spotlight: 2-3 on the Flat, the latter win gained in heavy-ground AQPS Group 3 at Nantes (1m4f, heavy) last month; weakened rather tamely when upped to AQPS Group 1 level three weeks later but still features prominently in calculations on hurdle debut.

runners.comment: Showed only minor promise in three Flat races; best watched on hurdle debut
runners.name: Macaboucombo
runners.spotlight: Showed only minor promise in three Flat races and was behind Malte de Solzen and Manuscrit at Angers on second occasion; best watched on hurdle debut.

runners.comment: Managed only seventh of nine on Flat debut in September
runners.name: Montana Dream
runners.owner: Lord Daresbury, Ecurie Mme Jacques Cypres & Laurent Couetil
runners.spotlight: Managed only seventh of nine on Flat debut in September (1m4f, heavy) and needs this switch to hurdling to show him in a much better light.

runners.comment: Out of an AQPS Group 3 Flat winner; wears hood/tongue-tie on debut, which is unnerving
runners.name: Mercato
runners.owner: Philippe Jerome, P & C Peltier Et Al
runners.spotlight: Out of an AQPS Group 3 Flat winner who also won over hurdles; wears hood/tongue-tie on debut, which is somewhat unnerving.

runners.comment: Did not show enough on his two Flat starts in June/September to be among the principals
runners.name: Moustach Rochelais
runners.spotlight: Did not show enough on his two Flat starts in June/September to be among the principals on this hurdling debut.

runners.comment: Never dangerous on the Flat last time (fifth) but she's 2-3 over hurdles; first chase
runners.name: Lutece Darthel
runners.owner: Comte Guillaume De Brondeau, E Clayeux & G De Brondeau
runners.spotlight: Never dangerous on the Flat last time (fifth) but she's 2-3 over hurdles at about 2m; every chance that she'll make a chaser and stay this longer trip.

runners.comment: Has won one of his four races over hurdles over a trip just shy of today's
runners.name: Leader Conti
runners.spotlight: Has won one of his four races over hurdles over a trip just shy of today's; fourth last time at Auteuil when keeping on over 2m2f; should feature.

runners.comment: Form figures of 726 over fences and has a bit on his plate on these terms
runners.name: Landais
runners.owner: Raphael Brakha, E Grall Et Al
runners.spotlight: Flat winner at about 1m2f and has also won a hurdle race at about 2m4f; form figures of 726 over fences and has a bit on his plate on these terms.

runners.comment: Made a winning start over fences in November but his fourth at Auteuil (2m5f) was remote
runners.name: Lieutenant Player
runners.spotlight: 0-3 over hurdles; made a winning start over fences in November but his fourth at Auteuil (2m5f) was remote; others preferred.

runners.breeder: Mme I Pacault, Mme M Girot-Pacault & Mme A-S Pacault
runners.comment: Finished encouragingly for third in first chase but tailed off and pulled up since
runners.name: Le Coup Denvoi
runners.spotlight: Lightly raced; finished encouragingly for third in his first chase but tailed off and pulled up since.

runners.comment: Ran in two cross-country chases before finishing a well-held third at Craon (2m2f)
runners.name: Le Charme
runners.spotlight: Ran in two cross-country chases before finishing a well-held third at Craon (2m2f); likely that he'll need more this afternoon.

runners.breeder: Earl Trinquet, O Trinquet & M Trinquet
runners.comment: Sent straight over fences for debut; dam unraced but sire won a Listed race over hurdles
runners.name: Lunic
runners.spotlight: Sent straight over fences for debut; dam unraced but his sire won a Listed race over hurdles.

runners.comment: Won one of her three races over hurdles; brings low mileage into chase career
runners.name: Lagune Doudairies
runners.spotlight: 2m1f winner over hurdles but beaten about 15l over 2m4f at Compiegne; brings low mileage into chase career and these terms give her a chance even without possible improvement factored in.

runners.breeder: Ecurie Haras Des Beaux & E Raquin
runners.comment: Showed promise in her two hurdles races, especially first time when only 5l off the winner
runners.name: Love Des Beaux
runners.owner: Ecurie Haras Des Beaux & Francois Nicolle
runners.spotlight: Unexposed filly who showed promise in her two hurdles races, especially first time when only 5l off the winner; trip will be fine.

runners.comment: Won small-field contest in October and comes here after good second at Auteuil; big player
runners.name: Katovice
runners.spotlight: Doubled chasing tally in small-field event at Lyon-Parilly (2m4f, heavy) in October and might well have bettered that performance when second at Auteuil (2m6f, heavy) last month, albeit no threat to winner; major player.

runners.comment: Runner-up in mares' race last month but has more on her plate here
runners.name: Kiss Kiss

prev_owners.owner: Simon Munir, Isaac Souede & Haras De Saint-Voir

runners.spotlight: Bounced back from poor run with second in mares' race at Moulins (2m3f, very soft) last month but has more on her plate here and is now 0-12 over fences.

runners.breeder: D Bernier, Mme A S Bernier Et Al
runners.comment: Returned from break with two chase wins this autumn, the latter over 2m4f here; respected
runners.name: Kokochaga
runners.owner: Mme Anne-Sophie Bernier, Ecurie Delaunay & David Bernier
runners.spotlight: Returned from a break with two chase wins this autumn, latterly when driven out to score by 3.5l over a slightly longer trip here (heavy) ten days ago; must be considered in current form.

runners.comment: Below form in last two handicap chases and remains without a win since 2022
runners.name: Jolivent

prev_owners.owner: Etienne Cournault, Alexis Acker Et Al

runners.spotlight: Kept on for modest second in Strasbourg handicap (2m5f, heavy) in October but was below that form on next two outings and is yet to add to his hurdling win of November 2022.

runners.comment: Badly out of form in cross-country chases and handicap hurdles when last seen this spring
runners.name: Illico
runners.spotlight: Badly out of form in cross-country chases and handicap hurdles for David Cottin when last seen in the spring; has a lot to prove on stable debut.

runners.comment: Runner-up on last three outings, most recently in this grade at Angers 18 days ago
runners.name: Kol Vert
runners.owner: Yves Le Louargant, Gregoire Juillet Et Al
runners.spotlight: Runner-up in two claiming chases last month and showed better form when filling same position in this grade of conditions chase at Angers (2m3f heavy) 18 days ago; probably won't be far away.

runners.comment: Has good chance at the weights here but absent since a poor run in May
runners.name: Kass Tete
runners.owner: Emmanuel Boutin, Ecurie Brillantissime Et Al
runners.spotlight: Gave a pretty good account when fifth at Auteuil (2m6f, very soft) in May and has good chance at the weights here, but not seen since he jumped right throughout and ran poorly at Lyon-Parilly later that month.

runners.comment: 2024 chase form makes him a leading contender and he ran well over hurdles this month
runners.name: Jibril Des Mottes
runners.owner: Earl Ecurie Des Mottes & Francois Nicolle
runners.spotlight: Off the mark over fences at second attempt, at Clairefontaine (2m2f, very soft) in July 2024, and a creditable third at Craon (2m5f, very soft) on next outing; that form makes him of strong interest and he rebounded from a low-key reappearance run when second over hurdles this month.

runners.comment: Absent since below-par hurdle run in June but has a fighting chance if fully tuned up
runners.name: Infra Rouge
runners.owner: Jose Louis Da Silva, Jacques Toulouse Et Al
runners.spotlight: Won over fences (2m7f here) and hurdles (2m3f) last year; absent since below-par hurdle run in June but has a fighting chance if fully tuned up.

runners.comment: 0-5 over fences and absent since a heavy fall in summer 2024
runners.name: Jumper Sacre
runners.spotlight: 0-5 over fences; in rear before falling heavily at penultimate fence at Clairefontaine in summer 2024 and best watched on first outing since.

runners.comment: Absent since falling in cross-country contest on chase debut in summer 2024
runners.name: Idealgador
runners.spotlight: Lightly raced 7yo who won over hurdles in July 2022, his third start, but was not seen again until falling in a cross-country chase in July 2024; returns from another long absence.

runners.comment: Chasing (all wins) is more his scene and he hasn't raced over hurdles for a while
runners.name: Captain Du Berlais
runners.spotlight: Cross-country winner last month and has winning form over regulation fences; that's perhaps more his scene and he hasn't raced over hurdles for a while.

runners.breeder: Haras Du Mondant & Bernard Le Roux
runners.comment: Could have run better last twice, for all that he contested a Listed hurdle two runs back
runners.name: Saint Bath

prev_owners.owner: Haras Du Mondant, Julien Merienne Et Al

runners.spotlight: Dual hurdle winner who is fine over this trip and handles heavy ground; could have run better the last twice, for all that he contested a Listed hurdle at Auteuil two runs back.

runners.comment: Runner-up in claiming and handicap company the last twice so he arrives in form
runners.name: Galet Doudairies

prev_owners.owner: Suc Francois Mauduit & A Le Clerc

runners.spotlight: Modest strike-rate and a 9yo now, but runner-up in claiming and handicap company the last twice so he arrives in form.

runners.comment: Lightly raced 6yo who won his first two races over hurdles but was laboured in the latest
runners.name: Juju Demonmirail
runners.owner: Philippe Sourzac, A Chaille-Chaille & F Pamart
runners.spotlight: Lightly raced 6yo who won his first two races over hurdles but was laboured in the latest (handicap), eventually pulling up; this might not be so challenging.

runners.comment: Last seen winning a maiden hurdle at Wincanton nearly two years ago
runners.name: Oak Creek
runners.owner: Tom George, Noel George & Amanda Zetterholm
runners.spotlight: Last seen winning a maiden hurdle at Wincanton nearly two years ago when trained by Tom George; the absence is worrying but his ability is respected.

runners.comment: No wins in 11 starts but placed a few times and has the form to feature at this level
runners.name: James De Baune
runners.spotlight: No wins in 11 starts but placed a few times and has the form to feature at this level; latest effort at Nancy was respectable.

runners.comment: Willing 5yo; wasn't beaten too far in handicap last time after finishing 2nd in a claimer
runners.name: Tafedney
runners.spotlight: Willing 5yo who wasn't beaten too far in a handicap last time after finishing second in a claimer; one to consider.

runners.comment: Sole career win came in 2022 and he was well beaten here last time after a long absence
runners.name: Irish Bar
runners.spotlight: Sole career win came in 2022 and he was well beaten here last time after a long absence.

runners.comment: Insufficient promise in two Flat runs to make any great appeal on hurdling/stable debut
runners.name: El Mundo
runners.spotlight: Insufficient promise in two Flat runs to make any great appeal on hurdling/stable debut.

runners.comment: 0-8 over hurdles and remote fifth in a conditions race last time at Toulouse
runners.name: Best Summer
runners.spotlight: 0-8 over hurdles and remote fifth in a conditions race last time at Toulouse; efforts prior to that weren't too clever, either.

runners.breeder: Mlle I Catsaras & Mlle V Dubois
runners.comment: Dual hurdle winner and arrives here after winning a handicap chase only recently
runners.name: Our Dream

prev_owners.owner: Ecurie De La Dentelle & Mlle E Allaire

runners.spotlight: Two hurdle wins include a claimer and he was clear with the second when winning a recent handicap over fences (2m6f); this shorter trip won't trouble him.

runners.comment: Longstanding maiden who runs well now and again but isn't the easiest to predict
runners.name: Bistrot Has
runners.spotlight: Longstanding maiden who runs well now and again but isn't the easiest to predict; two non-completions in her last three races.

runners.breeder: J Juillet, G Juillet & Mme F Juillet
runners.comment: Running quite well over fences when last seen but that was well over a year ago
runners.name: Aleoppe Pelem
runners.owner: Mme Florence Guineheux, Gregoire Juillet & Joel Juillet
runners.spotlight: Has placed form over hurdles; running quite well over fences when last seen but that was well over a year ago.

runners.comment: Lost out by only a head at Angers last month; likely contender again here
runners.name: Loustic De Grissay
runners.spotlight: 0-6 on the Flat but has taken well to hurdling his autumn and lost out by only a head at Angers (2m3f, soft) last month; likely to make his presence felt again here.

runners.comment: Won a modest claiming hurdle in October but fell on both subsequent outings
runners.name: Lascar De Mai
runners.spotlight: Won modest claiming hurdle in October (2m1f, very soft) but fell on both subsequent outings and comes with obvious risk attached.

runners.comment: Behind Loustic de Grissay and showed only minor promise when sixth on hurdle debut
runners.name: Lobelix Du Moulin
runners.owner: Bernard Rochereau, Fabrice Foucher & Mme Gwenaelle Le Pogam
runners.spotlight: Unplaced all three Flat starts and showed only minor promise when sixth on hurdling debut at Angers (2m3f, soft) last month, the race in which Loustic de Grissay was a close second.

runners.breeder: E Chevalier Du Fau, A Chevalier Du Fau & P De Broucker
runners.comment: Pulled up on both hurdling starts; eased in grade but still can't be recommended
runners.name: Lord Vivo
runners.spotlight: Pulled up on both hurdling starts; eased in grade but still can't be recommended.

runners.comment: Won minor Flat race during the summer but subsequent hurdle form is not inspiring
runners.name: Le Choregraphe
runners.spotlight: Won a minor Flat race on good ground in the summer but was safely held over hurdles on next two starts and fell when last in action.

runners.breeder: Mme G Mahot & Mme L Grall
runners.comment: Pulled up over C&D on hurdle debut but last month's Angers second was much better
runners.name: La Ptite Huguette
runners.owner: Mme Laure Grall & Mme Geraldine Mahot
runners.spotlight: Pulled up over C&D on hurdling debut just under a year ago but fared much better when second of eight at Angers (2m1f, very soft) last month and has each-way claims at least.

runners.comment: Runner-up on Flat debut in September but has made a quiet start to his hurdling career
runners.name: Le Petit Poucet

prev_owners.owner: Simon Munir, Isaac Souede & Haras De Saint-Voir

runners.spotlight: Runner-up on Flat debut in September but has made a quiet start to his hurdling career (three runs) and needs to take a good step forward.

runners.comment: Fourth on recent handicap debut at Angers and ought to find this race easier
runners.name: Love De La Noverie
runners.owner: A Le Clerc & Mme Maryse Riviere
runners.spotlight: Flat winner who has shown improvement on the last two of her four hurdling starts, more recently when fourth on handicap debut at Angers (2m3f, heavy) this month; ought to find this race easier and features prominently in calculations.

runners.breeder: Earl Trinquet, M Trinquet Et Al
runners.comment: A pulled-up outsider on both hurdling starts; blinkers are now added
runners.name: Le Mieux
runners.spotlight: A pulled-up outsider on both hurdling starts; needs a massive boost from the first-time blinkers.

runners.comment: Made quite a promising hurdle debut in February but was below that form this month
runners.name: Liberte Desprit
runners.spotlight: Won on the Flat in 2024 and launched her hurdling career with a pretty good fourth at Fontainebleau (2m2f, very soft) in February, but didn't run so well when back over hurdles this month.

runners.comment: Just a respectable fourth of six on hurdle debut in May and this is her first run since
runners.name: Love Me Baie
runners.spotlight: Flat winner in summer 2024 but just a respectable fourth of six on hurdle debut in May and this is her first run since.

runners.comment: Not disgraced on first two hurdling starts but needs improvement
runners.name: Limprevue Speciale
runners.owner: Ecurie Delaunay, Christophe Ore & Ocana Investments
runners.spotlight: Not disgraced on last month's hurdle debut but there was no improvement when seventh at Angers (2m3f, soft; race in which Loustic de Grissay was close second) a fortnight later.

runners.breeder: Scea De La Vallee De Lorne
runners.comment: Pulled up in her last two chases and makes only limited appeal on return to hurdling
runners.name: Lamia Dairy
runners.spotlight: Third on last month's chasing debut but pulled up on consecutive outings since and makes only limited appeal on this return to hurdling.

runners.breeder: Comte M De Gigou & Y De Gigou
runners.comment: Won minor 1m4f conditions race last month; now makes her hurdling debut
runners.name: Lyre Doudairies
runners.owner: Comte Michel De Gigou & A Le Clerc
runners.spotlight: Came good at seventh attempt, in minor conditions race (1m4f, very soft) last month; now makes her hurdling debut.

runners.comment: Won over similar trip at Toulouse in February; pulled up over fences when last seen in Aug
runners.name: Krack Du Bonheur
runners.spotlight: Won over a similar trip at Toulouse in February but 0-7 in the meantime and pulled up over fences when last seen in August.

runners.comment: Fell mid-race over fences last time but twice placed over fences at Saumur prior to that
runners.name: Klovis Bleue
runners.spotlight: Fell mid-race over fences last time but twice placed over fences at Saumur prior to that mishap, and hit the frame in some of his earlier races as well; remains a maiden but not without hope.

runners.comment: Had them well strung out at Nantes; lightly raced, unexposed and improving
runners.name: Chant De Garde
runners.spotlight: Has won two of his three starts over hurdles and, under a positive ride, had them well strung out last time at Nantes (2m3f); unexposed and improving.

runners.comment: Second over fences when last seen over a year ago; current wellbeing is an issue
runners.name: Kaline Roque
runners.owner: Mme Patrick Papot & Mme Daniela Mele
runners.spotlight: Has won over hurdles at Auteuil and finished second in a steeplechase when last seen just over a year ago; current wellbeing is an issue.

runners.comment: Dual winner but was a long way behind Chant De Garde last time at Nantes
runners.name: Litote Du Lannier
runners.spotlight: Dual winner but was a long way behind Chant De Garde last time at Nantes.

runners.breeder: Haras Des Evees, D Cherdo Et Al
runners.comment: Flat winner who remains a maiden over hurdles; needs to step up on his recent efforts
runners.name: Desert Storm
runners.spotlight: Flat winner who remains a maiden over hurdles and will need to step up on his recent efforts, the latest over fences.

runners.breeder: T Clayeux, E Clayeux & Mme A De Grossouvre
runners.comment: Flat/hurdle winner and successful over fences when last seen in July
runners.name: Koudou
runners.owner: Dominique Clayeux, Emmanuel Clayeux & Thomas Clayeux
runners.spotlight: Flat and hurdle winner who completed the set with a willing victory over fences at Vittel in July (2m5f); subsequent absence is a tad worrying but he's one to consider.

runners.comment: Only 7th last time in October and back from another break here
runners.name: Kesius Du Granit
runners.spotlight: Lightly raced; ran quite well in a Listed hurdle at Compiegne two runs back but that was in April and he could manage only seventh on October's return to action (conditions race); now back from another break.

runners.breeder: Mme M Juhen-Cypres, L Juhen Et Al
runners.comment: Beaten 2.5l into second in a conditions hurdle before an 18l second over fences
runners.name: Klaire Secrete
runners.spotlight: Beaten 2.5l into second in a conditions hurdle before an 18l second over fences; arrives in pretty good nick and considered.

runners.comment: Placed in Irish points and ran well for close second in conditions hurdle on French debut
runners.name: Mossy Walsh
runners.spotlight: Placed in Irish points and ran well for a close second in a conditions hurdle on French debut this month (2m3f); open to improvement.

runners.comment: Won on the Flat last year but twice well beaten in that scene after a year off
runners.name: Kid Of Storm
runners.spotlight: Won on the Flat at Nantes in June 2024, since when he's been confined to four races; well held in two Flat runs after a year off.

runners.breeder: Jean-Francois Magnien, Charles Magnien & Benoit Magnien
runners.comment: Staying on when taking a heavy late fall on his hurdling debut; has ability
runners.name: Katana Sei
runners.spotlight: Well beaten on Flat debut but was running well and staying on when taking a heavy late fall on his hurdling debut; has ability.

runners.comment: Not yet competitive in France; well behind Mossy Walsh last time
runners.name: Jonjo Bravo
runners.spotlight: Well beaten two British bumpers for two different yards and not yet competitive in France; well behind Mossy Walsh last time.

runners.comment: Has a lot to find with Chant De Garde and Litote Du Lannier on their Nantes clash
runners.name: Parkatthetheatre
runners.spotlight: Had little racing but has a lot to find with Chant De Garde and Litote Du Lannier on their Nantes clash; new headgear.

runners.breeder: Earl Patrick Joubert & Sc Ecurie Couderc
runners.comment: Has developed into a useful chaser who can hold her own at Listed level
runners.name: Kind Lovely
runners.owner: Sc Ecurie Couderc & Ecurie Patrick Joubert
runners.spotlight: Has developed into a useful chaser who can hold her own at Listed level and ran pretty well last time at Auteuil; unexposed over hurdles and receiving weight all round.
